main.name: Lasagna
main.description: Layers of pasta, ricotta cheese, Bolognese sauce, and Parmesan cheese baked to perfection.

main.name: Risotto alla Milanese
main.description: Creamy risotto flavored with saffron and Parmesan cheese.

main.name: Osso Buco
main.description: Braised veal shanks cooked with vegetables, white wine, and broth, served with gremolata.

main.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
main.description: Classic Roman pasta dish with pancetta, eggs, Parmesan, and black pepper.

main.name: Margherita Pizza
main.description: Traditional Neapolitan pizza topped with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and basil.

main.name: Fettuccine Alfredo
main.description: Pasta tossed in a creamy Parmesan cheese and butter sauce.

starter.name: Bruschetta
starter.description: Grilled bread topped with fresh tomatoes, basil, and olive oil.

starter.name: Caprese Salad
starter.description: Fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil drizzled with olive oil and balsamic glaze.

starter.name: Arancini
starter.description: Deep-fried rice balls stuffed with cheese and meat sauce.

starter.name: Prosciutto e Melone
starter.description: Thinly sliced cured ham served with sweet cantaloupe melon.

dessert.name: Tiramisu
dessert.description: Classic Italian dessert with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream..

dessert.name: Panna Cotta
dessert.description: Silky smooth vanilla-flavored cream dessert topped with berry sauce.

dessert.name: Cannoli
dessert.description: Fried pastry shells filled with sweet ricotta cheese and chocolate chips.

dessert.name: Gelato
dessert.description: Italian ice cream with a dense and creamy texture, available in various flavors.

dessert.name: Affogato
dessert.description: Vanilla gelato drowned in a shot of hot espresso.

drink.name: Espresso
drink.description: Rich and bold Italian coffee served in a small cup.

drink.name: Cappuccino
drink.description: Espresso topped with steamed milk and frothy foam.

drink.name: Aperol Spritz
drink.description: Refreshing cocktail made with Aperol, Prosecco, and a splash of soda.
